replies.body:
Fun fact: When sites like OP.GG get game data it is displayed (for draft qs) based on the role you were given. In that game for example, you are displayed last, do you know what that means? It means you were given support, took TF and proceeded to troll your MF who was placed ADC. This explains things in chat like: 

>yFbYMax: yaeh
yFbYMax: im not supp
yFbYMax: mf is lol  

You trolled because MF wouldn't give you the only role you can play. Enjoy your ban.

{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}


You have to wonder what's going on in these people's mind sometimes and where is their integrity or if the word integrity even mean anything to them....

First of all, there is no rule that support cannot cs or farm. So you are wrong to assume it's all yours.

Second of all, regardless of her actions in game, you do not get to flame her for it in retaliation.
haha you try playing adc with an ADC SUPPORT and not flaming them for taking all your farm :) i told her to stop csing and she didnt so in my opinion thats toxic.

Again, you have no right to tell her not to cs as the farm and minions are neutral monsters that do not belong to any one individual.

I bet if you post your chat log you said a lot more than that though.

Haha this is the funniest complaint I've seen in a while. A support TF with green trinket placed 0 wards all game, built AD, and tried to make the MF who was assigned adc go support. Then he lied about which role he was given, flamed her all game, tried to get her reported... and then asks why he was banned...

I hope you never come back.

You were placed support, deserved ban.

Also saving this as an example for when people say role stealing isn't punished.

A draven one trick...ironic

We can see what role you were assigned to. 

Your toxiciy hasn't changed at all. Deserved banned.

1: Other languages are not beneath your own

2: MF support has been a thing and I do not see why it cannot be today

3: MF Q works in such a way she was probably trying to bounce shots into the enemies when she was "stealing" "your" cs.

4: Even if she had been trolling that would not be why you were banned. You were banned for belittling real people.

Constantly harassing MF all game long as well as using report calling as a leaping off point for harassment directed towards her and a little bit towards your other teammates near the end of the game. None of what you said this game was helpful or constructive, and while she may not have been playing as you wanted her to that's still no excuse to constantly complain about it and harass her over it the entire game. I imagine your teammates were annoyed by it as well, as otherwise they wouldn't have reported you that game.

Next time just try to work with what you have if possible, or at the very least if you must complain then keep it out of chat, as no one wants to listen to someone whine and complain non-stop all game long. That just takes time away from playing the game itself.

I understand where you are coming from. Lmao i use to do this. Then i played like that mf. League is open to new ideas that's why the meta is always changing. Just because something doesn't go your way doesn't mean you have the right to flame. Just take a break for a little bit.
